import React from 'react' import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag' import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz' import Badge from './index'; export default class MDXContent extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.layout = null } render() { const { components, ...props } = this.props return {`Badge`} {`They're useful when you want to add additional info. Like a version number of a project or for status messages for individual items.`} 34 unread messages'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Badge}}> 34 unread messages {`Colours`} {`Badges come as default, brand, info, warning, success and error`} {`To use, add the `}{`type`}{` prop:`} Default\n
